rank - Variable in enum cscd211Enums.Suit
The private data member of type int for the rank

The private declaration for the int rank data member
readCardsToDeal(Scanner, int) - Static method in class cscd211Methods.Lab3Methods
The readCardsToDeal method prompts the user for the number of cards to deal to each player.
readMaxPlayerCards(Scanner) - Static method in class cscd211Methods.Lab3Methods
The readMaxPlayerCards method creates prompts the user for the number of the maximum number of cards the player can have in their hand.
readTimesToShuffle(Scanner) - Static method in class cscd211Methods.Lab3Methods
The readTimesToShuffle method creates prompts the user for the number of times to shuffle and ensures the value is greater than 0
readTotalPlayers(Scanner) - Static method in class cscd211Methods.Lab3Methods
The readTotalPlayers method prompts the total number of players that will be playing the game.
reset() - Method in class cscd211Game.Players.Dealer
The reset method resets the players hands and resets the deck
resetDeck() - Method in class cscd211Game.Classes.Deck
The resetDeck method resets the deck as if it were a brand new deck.
resetPlayerHand() - Method in class cscd211Game.Players.Player
The resetPlayerHand resets the number of cards in the players hand This method gets called at the end of each round of play
